# Government Tender Announcement: PR4209 23375-230278 Airflow Station

## Title and Reference Numbers

* Title: Airflow Station
* Official Title (French): Station de circulation d'air
* Reference Number: WS3669721988-Doc3705416661
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS3669721988

## Tender Details

* Publication Date: October 12, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 16, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: November 16, 2023

## Tender Status and Contracting Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

## Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada requires an airflow station designed and manufactured to ASHRAE 37-2009 specifications to support the Climate Controlled Testing Facility in Ottawa, Ontario. The required airflow station must measure airflow of centrally ducted, forced air equipment under test.

The successful contractor must provide:
- One airflow station including all necessary cables and accessories
- Documentation
- One year warranty including maintenance and support services

## Important Notice

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be considered non-responsive.

## Procurement Process

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
